mapper.sql: MERCHANT_NODE_ID, TENANT_ID, MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, PARENT_ID, `PATH`, NODE_TYPE, PROVINCE_REGION_ID, CITY_REGION_ID, DISTRICT_REGION_ID, STREET_REGION_ID, REGION_INFO, REGION_INFO_ID, DETAIL_ADRESS, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, SUP_STATUS, CONTACTS, PHONE, OVERALL_SCORE, VISIT_CNT, CREATETIME, UPDATETIME, `STATUS`, path_name, QR_CODE, ANNUAL_GRADE, SAFETY_GRADE, SAVE_STATES, CURR_SAFTY_GRADE, Merchant_TYPE, Merchant_SUB_TYPE, LICENSE, OPEN_STATUS, H5_QR_CODE, quantification_grade, risk_level, static_score, operating_state, regulation_id, sort, phoneEncrypt, device_count, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, canteen_cnt_ck, admin_type, admin_code, is_city_manage
mapper.select:
select a.*,blade_region.code from (select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.PROVINCE_REGION_ID and sup_merchant_node_tbl.CITY_REGION_ID is null and DISTRICT_REGION_ID is null and STREET_REGION_ID is null where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点' union
select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.CITY_REGION_ID and DISTRICT_REGION_ID is null and STREET_REGION_ID is null where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点'
union select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.DISTRICT_REGION_ID and STREET_REGION_ID is null where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点' union select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.STREET_REGION_ID where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点') as a left join blade_region on a.namecn = blade_region.name limit 1000

select count(a.MERCHANT_NODE_NAME) from (select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.PROVINCE_REGION_ID and sup_merchant_node_tbl.CITY_REGION_ID is null and DISTRICT_REGION_ID is null and STREET_REGION_ID is null where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点' union
select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.CITY_REGION_ID and DISTRICT_REGION_ID is null and STREET_REGION_ID is null where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点'
union select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.DISTRICT_REGION_ID and STREET_REGION_ID is null where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点' union select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.STREET_REGION_ID where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点') as a

select a.* from (select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.PROVINCE_REGION_ID and sup_merchant_node_tbl.CITY_REGION_ID is null and DISTRICT_REGION_ID is null and STREET_REGION_ID is null where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点' union select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.CITY_REGION_ID and DISTRICT_REGION_ID is null and STREET_REGION_ID is null where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点' union select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.DISTRICT_REGION_ID and STREET_REGION_ID is null where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点' union select MERCHANT_NODE_NAME, regiontbl.namecn, MERCHANT_NODE_CODE, LONGITUDE, LATITUDE, DETAIL_ADRESS, CONTACTS, PHONE, Merchant_TYPE, sup_merchant_node_tbl.STATUS from sup_merchant_node_tbl left join regiontbl on regiontbl.regionid = sup_merchant_node_tbl.STREET_REGION_ID where regiontbl.namecn is not null and MERCHANT_NODE_NAME != '默认商家节点') as a limit #{start},#{offset}
